channel.title: [VFM] A Hat in Time Cop13er - Signups (FULL)
channel.description:
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/561381759795855370/852987195812347904/a-hat-in-time-switch-hero.png
# Welcome to A Hat in Time Cop13er! Hosted by @EliThePsycho and @Arctic
# Rules Follow the rules found here: https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/global-forum-discord-game-meta-rules-please-read-first/244?u=elithepsycho https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/official-forum-mafia-and-forum-of-lies-rules/78926?u=elithepsycho Additionally, for this game, a minimum requirement of **20 substantive, on-topic, game related posts** per in game day are required. Posts that are explicitly or obviously made solely for the purpose of meeting this requirement do not count towards the minimum, nor do posts containing *solely* a vote. The first time a player fails to meet this requirement, they will be given a warning; the second time they fail to meet it, they will be replaced out. A player who zero-posts will be subbed out without a warning. This requirement may be reduced or waived if an execution is hammered early by majority. # Rolelist [color=]**Town Vanilla** [/color] [color=]**Town Vanilla** [/color] [color=]**Town Vanilla** [/color] [color=]**Town Vanilla** [/color] [color=]**Town Vanilla** [/color] [color=]**Town Vanilla** [/color] [color=]**Town Vanilla** [/color] [color=]**Town Vanilla** [/color] [color=]**Town Vanilla** [/color] [color=]**Town Cop**[/color] [color=red]**Mafia Goon**[/color] [color=red]**Mafia Goon**[/color] [color=red]**Mafia Goon**[/color]
[details="Sample Role PMs (this flavor will not be present)"] > # [color=]Hat Kid (Town Vanilla)[/color] > ![image|180x185](upload://6tysKAPRJyc9AM0gS2Eaj4AIKRl.png) > *"I'm a time traveling explorer! No area is too dangerous for me and my umbrella. My mission is to find all the time pieces so I can go home!"* > Your weapons are your voice and your vote. Use them wisely.
> # [color=]Hat Kid (Town Cop)[/color] >![image|180x185](upload://6tysKAPRJyc9AM0gS2Eaj4AIKRl.png) > *"I'm a time traveling explorer! No area is too dangerous for me and my umbrella. My mission is to find all the time pieces so I can go home!"* > Each night, you may target a player (not yourself). You learn if they are a member of the [color=red]**Mafia**[/color]. > > Additionally, you know that [X] is [color=]**Town**[/color]. Their name will be redacted upon your flip.
> # [color=red]Hat Kid (Mafia Goon)[/color] >![image|180x185](upload://6tysKAPRJyc9AM0gS2Eaj4AIKRl.png) > *"I'm a time traveling explorer! No area is too dangerous for me and my umbrella. My mission is to find all the time pieces so I can go home!"* > You share a 24/7 private chat with your fellow members of the Mafia. Each night, the Mafia must kill a player outside your faction. [/details]
# Gameplay * This setup is a cop13er with A Hat in Time flavor. Flavor solve at your own risk, for flavor is NAI. * Days are 48 hours long, Nights are 24. At all points during the night, if all alive players vote to skip the night, the game will immediatley progress into the next day. * The wincon for the [color=]**Town**[/color] is *Kill all [color=red]**Mafia**[/color] members.* The wincon for the [color=red]**Mafia**[/color] is to *Reach parity with the [color=]**Town**[/color]* * The [color=red]**Mafia**[/color] will communicate through a special Discord/Forum PM * No-execute is a valid vote, and may be hammered to end the day early. In cases where no-execute and another vote are tied at the end of the day, no-execute will have priority in the rand. * In cases where the votes are tied, the result will be randed in spec chat. * Self votes are **not** valid votes. * [color=red]**Mafia**[/color] have a factional kill. It is mandatory, and must be performed every night. If they do not submit a kill, it will be randomized outside of the [color=red]**Mafia**[/color]. * All votes must be in the form **/vote [name of player]** (and ping the hosts/vc bots) to be considered valid, and all unvotes must be in the form **/unvote** (and ping the hosts/vc bots) This is to enable the smooth processing of votes. * Executions are both majority and plurality
### Alts are not allowed. # Playerlist 1. Alice 1. thepigeonnyc 1. Silviu 1. Chloe 1. Centuries 1. Zone_Q11 1. Ruri 1. Vulgard 1. Marl 1. Cream 1. LiL 1. Psyx 1. Appelsiini # Backups 1. Wazza 1. Katze 1. GGhana 1. Mistyx 1. WindwardAway # Spectators 1. Marshal (uninformed) 1. DatBird (uninformed) 3. Min(formed) 4.
